title: MONDAY Week 7 recap 2020
itunes:title: MONDAY Week 7 recap 2020
description:
Sunday night action wrapped up with a thrill in Arizona (0:24) as the Cardinals beat the Seahawks in overtime. It was a win that Kyler Murray feels can do big things for the Cardinals franchise (0:38). The Steelers (1:18) remain the only unbeaten team in the AFC after defeating the Titans, while Baker Mayfield (1:57) had his best game of the season, throwing 5 TD passes as the Browns knocked off the Bengals in the battle of Ohio. The Cowboys losing Andy Dalton (3:19) on an illegal hit by Jon Bostic. Hear what head coach Mike McCarthy had to say about the hit. And, Bruce Arians (4:27) talks about the Buccaneers addition of Antonio Brown

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
